outputs.output_descr:
Output 1
President's public information system responds to citizens' information requests and pro-actively provides relevant information to the media
Output 2
The Kyrgyz National TV and Radio Corporation is reformed into the public broadcaster with all requisite legislative, organizational and institutional arrangements enabling it to serve the public interest in an effective and efficient way.

project_descr: Capacity Building for Public Information and Reforming National Television and Radio into the Public Service Broadcaster
